message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $100. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll be happy with it. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $85 for the product. Let me know if this works for you!
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something a little closer to my asking price. How about $95? It's still a good deal for you, and we can close this quickly.
Hello Alice, thank you for your follow-up offer. I understand your position, but I can only commit to $90 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle for us.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $90 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $97 to make this deal happen.  Let me know if that works for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I can agree to $95 for the product. This feels like a fair compromise for both of us.
